title: TV tonight: catching a serial killer who targets happy families
summary: Tonight's highlights include a new episode of the US thriller "The Hunting Party," delivering suspenseful twists. Additionally, viewers are curious about Celia Imrie's next moves in "The Celebrity Traitors." Tune in to catch both shows this evening.

title: From CBS to TikTok, US media are falling to Trump’s allies. This is how democracy crumbles | Owen Jones
summary: Owen Jones, a columnist for The Guardian, warns about the increasing influence of the "Orbánisation" trend in the US, highlighting the crucial role of media control in consolidating political power. He draws parallels between the current political climate in the US and Hungary under Prime Minister Viktor Orbán. Jones emphasizes the implications of this trend for democracy and public discourse in America.

title: Weatherwatch: what is the difference between a hurricane and a typhoon?
summary: Cyclones are circular storms that originate in different regions and differ in size and effects. They have unique characteristics based on their formation locations. Understanding these distinctions helps assess their potential impact on affected areas.
